scripts.verify:ci: bun run typecheck && bun run check && bun run docs:check:ci && bun run check-exports && bun run check-readme-imports && bun run build && bun run check-clean-tree && bun run test
scripts.build:local: bunup && bun scripts/normalize-exports.ts && cd apps/outfitter && bun link
scripts.docs:sync: cd packages/docs && bun src/cli.ts docs sync --cwd ../..
scripts.docs:check: cd packages/docs && bun src/cli.ts docs check --cwd ../..
scripts.docs:check:ci: bun run docs:sync:core && git diff --exit-code -- docs/packages docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt && test -z "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard -- docs/packages docs/llms.txt docs/llms-full.txt)"
